description: This file declares the 'dhcp_stub_hal' class, which provides an interface for DHCP-related RPC methods, including getters for various DHCP and network configuration parameters, meant to be used in a testing or stubbing context.

classes.name: dhcp_stub_hal
classes.description: This class provides a test stub interface for DHCP HAL interactions, supporting RPC method binding and various DHCP parameter retrieval functions.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the DHCP stub HAL module with a specified version string.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Performs cleanup operations for the DHCP stub HAL.

methods.name: testmodulepre_requisites
methods.description: Pre-requisite checks before running tests on the module.

methods.name: testmodulepost_requisites
methods.description: Post-requisite cleanup after tests are run.

methods.name: dhcp_stub_hal_get_ecm_config_attempts
methods.description: Retrieves the number of attempts for ECM DHCP configuration.

methods.name: dhcp_stub_hal_get_ecm_dns_svrs
methods.description: Gets the list of ECM DNS servers.

methods.name: dhcp_stub_hal_get_ecm_fsm_state

methods.name: dhcp_stub_hal_get_ecm_gw
methods.description: Gets the ECM gateway address.

methods.name: dhcp_stub_hal_get_ecm_ifname

methods.name: dhcp_stub_hal_get_ecm_ip_addr

methods.name: dhcp_stub_hal_get_ecm_lease_time

methods.name: dhcp_stub_hal_get_ecm_mask
methods.description: Gets the ECM subnet mask.
